mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
t_loto_f_eth t_loto_f_gto t_loto_f_uz
(issue,starttime,endtime,home_team_name,guest_team_name,home_team_id,guest_team_id,home_half_result,guest_half_result,home_full_result,guest_full_result,had,cg_had,had_h,had_d,had_a,had_h_0,had_d_0,had_a_0,status,leaguename) VALUES
(#{v.issue},#{v.starttime},#{v.endtime},#{v.home_team_name},#{v.guest_team_name},#{v.home_team_id},#{v.guest_team_id},#{v.home_half_result},#{v.guest_half_result},#{v.home_full_result},#{v.guest_full_result},#{v.had},#{v.cg_had},#{v.had_h},#{v.had_d},#{v.had_a},#{v.had_h_0},#{v.had_d_0},#{v.had_a_0},#{v.status},#{v.leaguename})

REPLACE INTO
t_loto_f_eth t_loto_f_gto t_loto_f_uz
(issue,starttime,endtime,home_team_name,guest_team_name,home_team_id,guest_team_id,home_half_result,guest_half_result,home_full_result,guest_full_result,had,cg_had,had_h,had_d,had_a,had_h_0,had_d_0,had_a_0,status,leaguename) VALUES
(#{v.issue},#{v.starttime},#{v.endtime},#{v.home_team_name},#{v.guest_team_name},#{v.home_team_id},#{v.guest_team_id},#{v.home_half_result},#{v.guest_half_result},#{v.home_full_result},#{v.guest_full_result},#{v.had},#{v.cg_had},#{v.had_h},#{v.had_d},#{v.had_a},#{v.had_h_0},#{v.had_d_0},#{v.had_a_0},#{v.status},#{v.leaguename})
